Title: The Body
Writer: Carlton Cuse (developed for television by), Kerry Ehrin (developed for television by), Anthony Cipriano (developed for television by), Erica Lipez, Robert Bloch (based on characters from the novel 'Psycho' by), Philip Buiser (executive story editor), Torrey Speer (story editor)
Actors: Vera Farmiga, Freddie Highmore, Max Thieriot, Olivia Cooke
Plot: Mother uses tough love to protect Norman; Sheriff Greene opens a murder investigation; Dylan gets help for his brother.
